title: NHSRC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Consultant Post
description: The National Health Systems Resource Centre (NHSRC) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Consultant Jobs. Candidates who have qualified in the MBBS, BDS, and BAMS can grab this chance and apply for the NHSRC Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the website on or before the la...
